title: Easy Shake and Bake Chicken Recipe
description: Shake chicken in a blend of flour and seasonings, then bake until crispy on the outside and tender and juicy inside. Easy to prep and delicious!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Meat and Poultry Chicken Baked and Roasted Easy Shake and Bake Chicken 4.5 (810) 634 Reviews 43 Photos Shake chicken in a blend of flour and seasonings, then bake in butter until golden and crisp for a very enjoyable and very easy-to-make family dinner! Submitted by Candy Updated on March 6, 2023 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 43 43 43 43 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 45 mins Total Time: 1 hr Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 3 pounds chicken, cut into pieces ½ cup all-purpose flour 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon paprika ¼ teaspoon sage ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper ½ cup butter Directions Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) and gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Mix flour, salt, paprika, sage, and pepper together in a resealable plastic bag. Place chicken parts into the bag; seal and shake until well coated. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Melt butter in a 9x13-inch baking dish in the preheated oven. Arrange coated chicken pieces in the baking dish skin-side down and bake for 20 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Turn chicken pieces over and bake until no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 20 minutes more. An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Serve hot and enjoy! DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS  I Made It Print 1,097 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Easy Shake and Bake Chicken 01 of 43 Photo by  DOTDASH MEREDITH FOOD STUDIOS  02 of 43 Photo by  MariaS 01/19/2025 A keeper! My husband loved this! He actually say I should post this somewhere 🤣 03 of 43 Photo by  AFGRANDMA 01/10/2025 A keeper! Great flavors Easy to follow Worth the effort This was so easy and taste wonderful!! Crunchy crust and juicie chicken. I used thighs and it was perfect!! 04 of 43 Photo by  Wikd_homecook 11/10/2022 This easier, cleaner and healthier method for fried chicken is definitely a keeper. After reading other reviews a couple things I did differently to suit my tastes. I doubled the spices, then seasoned the thighs & drumsticks in the morning which included garlic and onion powder along with the other spices and returned to the fridge. At dinner time, pulled the chicken out 30 minutes prior to baking, preheated my iron skillet in a 425 degree oven, with a 1/4 cup butter and 2 tbsp. Olive oil. Dumped all the leftover spice mixture from the morning into the flour, added 1/4 cup seasoned bread crumbs shook it all up and placed it skin side down into the skillet. Baked for 25 minutes, then flipped over and baked another 20 minutes. Chicken came out moist, crunchy and very flavorful. New go to, no more frying on the stove, no messy stovetop and it tasted fabulous! 05 of 43 Photo by  debbie capaldo 06/20/2020 06 of 43 Photo by  Amanda Rosselli 06/19/2020 07 of 43 Photo by  hubkap28 05/01/2020 08 of 43 Photo by  Cookie 08/21/2019 Fantastic recipe. I used 4 skin on chicken thighs. My only deviation from the recipe was marinating the chicken in buttermilk for 1/2 hour. 09 of 43 Photo by  Gord 02/13/2019 Chicken can’t be done any better than this. It’s my all time favourite, crispy and juicy. 10 of 43 Photo by  Gord 02/13/2019 Chicken can’t be done any better than this. It’s my all time favourite, crispy and juicy. 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Keto Smothered Chicken Thighs 163 Ratings Keto Open-Faced Chicken Cordon Bleu 28 Ratings Quick Chicken Divan 628 Ratings Anniversary Chicken II 145 Ratings Broiled Paprika and Lemon-Pepper Chicken Breasts 19 Ratings Easy Garlic and Rosemary Chicken 239 Ratings Easy Garlic Broiled Chicken 2,073 Ratings Chicken-Stuffed Baked Avocados 447 Ratings Broiled Herb Butter Chicken 263 Ratings Super Simple Oven-Barbequed Chicken 50 Ratings Creamy Baked Asiago Chicken Breasts 111 Ratings Party Chicken I 64 Ratings Smothered Chicken with Mushrooms 24 Ratings Lemon-Roasted Chicken 92 Ratings Feta Chicken 741 Ratings Baked Lemon Butter Chicken Thighs 156 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
